DEFAULT_POSTURE_TOLERANCE

public static final float DEFAULT_POSTURE_TOLERANCE
Default accuracy value for posture detection. 0f..1f.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Skeleton

public Skeleton(SimpleOpenNI.SimpleOpenNI _kinect,
                int _userId,
                boolean _fullBodyTracking,
                boolean _calculateLocalCoordSys,
                short _mirrorTherapy)
Constructor for the Skeleton.

Parameters:
_kinect - Handle to the SimpleOpenNI object. Skeleton will maintain its status in the update method by talking to SimpleOpenNI directly.
_userId - the user ID of the skeleton
_fullBodyTracking - switches full body tracking on/off. If switched off, only upper body joints will be evaluated
_calculateLocalCoordSys - switches calculation of the local coordinate system on/off. If switched on, local coordination system will be calculated and joints will be transformed to it
_mirrorTherapy - Sets the skeleton to mirror one body side to the other. When mirrorTherapy is set on, mirrorPlane will be calculated. Short value should correspond to skeleton constants. If out of range, mirror therapy will be switched off
Method Detail

update

public void update()
Update method. Call it to update status of skeleton. Skeleton will talk to SimpleOpenNI directly and will do all the necessary math for updating its status according to set up

setMirrorTherapy

public void setMirrorTherapy(short _mirrorTherapy)
Setter for mirror therapy modus. Sets the skeleton to mirror one body side to the other. When mirrorTherapy is set on, mirrorPlane will be calculated

Parameters:
_mirrorTherapy - short corresponding to Skeleton constants. If out of range, mirror therapy mode will be switched off

getMirrorTherapy

public short getMirrorTherapy()
Getter for mirror therapy modus.

Returns:
short mirror therapy modus corresponding to Skeleton constants

setFullBodyTracking

public void setFullBodyTracking(boolean _fullBodyTracking)
Setter for fullBodyTracking. If full body tracking is switched off, only upper body joints will be evaluated.

Parameters:
_fullBodyTracking - switch full body tracking on/off

getFullBodyTracking

public boolean getFullBodyTracking()
Getter for full body tracking.

Returns:
true if full body tracking is switched on

setCalculateLocalCoordSys

public void setCalculateLocalCoordSys(boolean _calculateLocalCoordSys)
Setter for calculating the local coordinate system. If switched on, joints will be transformed to local coordinate system.

Parameters:
_calculateLocalCoordSys - switch calculating the local coordinate system on/off

getCalculateLocalCoordSys

public boolean getCalculateLocalCoordSys()
Getter for calculating the local coordinate system.

Returns:
true if calculating the local coordinate system is switched on

setPostureTolerance

public void setPostureTolerance(float _postureTolerance)
Setter for the tolerance with which posture will be detected. 0..1f.

Parameters:
the - tolerance between 0..1f. when higher than 1 or lower than 0, default tolerance will be set

getPostureTolerance

public float getPostureTolerance()
Getter for calculating the local coordinate system.

Returns:
true if calculating the local coordinate system is switched on

isUpdated

public boolean isUpdated()
Getter for status of the skeleton. Is used as a lock, methods of skeleton will return unsafe values, as long update function is not done.

Returns:
true if the status of the skeleton is fully updated

getUserId

public int getUserId()
Getter for user ID of the skeleton.

Returns:
the user ID of the skeleton

getJoint

public processing.core.PVector getJoint(short jointType)
This method returns the joint position of a certain joint in the global coordinate system

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint in the global coordinate system as vector. If jointType out of range: 0-vector

getJointProjective

public processing.core.PVector getJointProjective(short jointType)
This method returns the joint position of a certain joint on the kinect's projective plane. Z-value will be 0

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint as vector on the projective plane of the kinect. If jointType out of range: 0-vector

getJointLocalCoordSys

public processing.core.PVector getJointLocalCoordSys(short jointType)
The positions of the joints are transformed to the local coordinate system of the skeleton if calculateLocalCoordSys was set. This method returns the joint position of a certain joint in the local coordinate system. Works only if localCoordSysCalculated is true.

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The position of a certain joint in the local coordinate system as vector. If jointType out of range or if localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getLeftUpperArm

public processing.core.PVector getLeftUpperArm()
The vectors for lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience.

Returns:
The vector for the left upper arm

public processing.core.PVector getLeftLowerArm()
The vectors for lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience.

Returns:
The vector for the left lower arm

The vector for the right upper arm

public processing.core.PVector getRightLowerArm()
The vectors for lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience.

Returns:
The vector for the right lower arm

getLeftUpperArmLocal

public processing.core.PVector getLeftUpperArmLocal()
The vectors for the lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience. The arms in the local coordinate system are calculated only if calculateLocalCoordSys was set.

Returns:
The vector for the left upper arm in the local coordinate system. If localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getRightUpperArmLocal

public processing.core.PVector getRightUpperArmLocal()
The vectors for the lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience. The arms in the local coordinate system are calculated only if calculateLocalCoordSys was set.

Returns:
The vector for the left lower arm in the local coordinate system. If localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getLeftLowerArmLocal

public processing.core.PVector getLeftLowerArmLocal()
The vectors for the lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience. The arms in the local coordinate system are calculated only if calculateLocalCoordSys was set.

Returns:
The vector for the right upper arm in the local coordinate system. If localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getRightLowerArmLocal

public processing.core.PVector getRightLowerArmLocal()
The vectors for the lower and upper arms are calculated for convenience. The arms in the local coordinate system are calculated only if calculateLocalCoordSys was set.

Returns:
The vector for the right lower arm in the local coordinate system. If localCoordSys was not calculated: 0-vector

getConfidenceJoint

public float getConfidenceJoint(short jointType)
The positions of the joints are evaluated with a certain confidence value. This method returns the confidence value for a certain joint

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The confidence value of a certain joint. Between 0f and 1f. If jointType out of range: 0f

getJointOrientation

public processing.core.PMatrix3D getJointOrientation(short jointType)
The orientations of the joints are evaluated with a certain confidence value. This method returns the orientation matrix

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The orientation matrix of a certain joint. PMatrix3D. If jointType out of range: 0-Matrix

getConfidenceJointOrientation

public float getConfidenceJointOrientation(short jointType)
The orientations of the joints are evaluated with a certain confidence value. This method returns the confidence value

Parameters:
jointType - The joint for which confidence value should be returned. Should be a short value corresponding to Skeleton constants.
Returns:
The confidence value for the evaluated orientation of a certain joint. Between 0f and 1f. If jointType out of range: 0f

getRVectorMirrorPlane

public processing.core.PVector getRVectorMirrorPlane()
Mirror Plane is defined in HNF: r*n0-d = 0. works only if mirror plane has been calculated, i.e. skeleton is in mirror therapy mode.

Returns:
the r vector of the mirrorPlane if mirror plane was calculated. Else 0-vector

getN0VectorMirrorPlane

public processing.core.PVector getN0VectorMirrorPlane()
Mirror Plane is defined in HNF: r*n0-d = 0. works only if mirror plane has been calculated, i.e. skeleton is in mirror therapy mode.

Returns:
the normal vector of the mirrorPlane if mirror plane was calculated. Else 0-vector

getDValueMirrorPlane

public float getDValueMirrorPlane()
Mirror Plane is defined in HNF: r*n0-d = 0. works only if mirror plane has been calculated, i.e. skeleton is in mirror therapy mode.

Returns:
the distance of the mirrorPlane to the origin if mirror plane was calculated. Else 0f

getOrigin

public processing.core.PVector getOrigin()
returns the origin of the local coordsys. Equals Torso Vector. works only if localCoordSys has been calculated

Returns:
the origin. 0-vector if localCoordSys has not been calculated

getOrientationX

public processing.core.PVector getOrientationX()
returns the local x coordinate vector. works only if localCoordSys has been calculated

Returns:
the local vector. 0-vector if localCoordSys has not been calculated

getOrientationXProjective

public processing.core.PVector getOrientationXProjective()
returns the local x coordinate vector projected to the kinects projectionn plane. works only if localCoordSys has been calculated

Returns:
the local vector projected to the kinects projection plane. 0-vector if localCoordSys has not been calculated

getOrientationAlpha

public float getOrientationAlpha()
returns the angle between the local x vector and the global x vector. works only if localCoordSys has been calculated

Returns:
the angle, float between 0 and PI. 0f when localCoordSys has not been calculated

getOrientationY

public processing.core.PVector getOrientationY()
returns the local y coordinate vector. works only if localCoordSys has been calculated

Returns:
the local vector. 0-vector if localCoordSys has not been calculated

Returns:
the local vector projected to the kinects projection plane. 0-vector if localCoordSys has not been calculated

Returns:
the angle, float between 0 and PI. 0f when localCoordSys has not been calculated

getOrientationGamma

public float getOrientationGamma()
returns the angle between the local z vector and the global z vector. works only if localCoordSys has been calculated

Returns:
the angle, float between 0 and PI. 0f when localCoordSys has not been calculated

angleBetween

public float angleBetween(short joint11,
                          short joint12,
                          short joint21,
                          short joint22)
returns the angle between two limb-vectors

Parameters:
joint11 - the joint the limb-vector1 points to
joint12 - the joint the limb-vector1 origins in
joint21 - the joint the limb-vector2 points to
joint22 - the joint the limb-vector2 origins in
Returns:
the angle, float between 0 and PI

distanceToKinect

public float distanceToKinect()
returns the distance of the skeletons torso joint to the kinect

Returns:
the distance in mm, magnitude of skeletons torso vector

evaluateUpperJointPosture

public short evaluateUpperJointPosture()
Evaluates if current upper body posture corresponds to one of the following shapes:

(H = hand, E = elbow, S = shoulder)
----------------------
H H
E E = V
SS
----------------------
SS
E E = A
H H
----------------------
H H
= U
E SS E
----------------------
E SS E
= N
H H
----------------------
E E
SS = M
H H
----------------------
H H
SS = W
E E
--------------------------------------------
HH SS
E E = O = E E
SS HH
--------------------------------------------
HH SS
EE = I = EE
SS HH
--------------------------------------------
S S
E HH E = NAMASTE
--------------------------------------------

Returns:
current upper body posture. short, constants of Skeleton class

getCurrentUpperBodyPosture

public short getCurrentUpperBodyPosture()
Returns the evaluated upper body posture. works only if posture was calculated in the current update cycle

Returns:
current upper body posture. short, constants of Skeleton class. NO_SHAPE if posture was not updated
